title: Batman Arkham Shadow Quick Review
description:
Barrett really REALLY likes this game. 
From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e3RCdEx11y4&t=17s&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0

transcript_chunks.text: I want to take it back to Dan stapleton's review of Arkham Origins Batman games are like pizza even when they're not very good they're still pretty good I would equate Arkham Shadow to a calzone it's the same ingredients given to you in a different method some people like calzones some people just want their Pizza ladies gentlemen enbi I really like calzones and I really really like Batman Arkham Shadow and so far nine and a half hours in I would give it an solid eight out of 10 uh on the kind of funny scale it's a calzone bab it's a great calzone everybody B Mia
